title: Panasonic LUMIX DMC-ZS19 Digital Camera- Black
description:
14.1 megapixels 3.0 TFT Touch Screen LCD Display POWER O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) suppresses the low-frequency vibration hand-shake component, which is physically generated when pressing the shutter button or when shooting at night with a slow shutter speed Multi-process Noise Reduction applies optimum noise reduction according to the brightness of the part of the image Active Mode effectively suppresses blur in video recording especially at wide angle Note: Used Like New in original packaging.
